text: ya 'ayuha alnabiu 'iidha 'aradtama- 'ant walmuminuna- 'ana ttlliqu nisa'akum fataliquhuna mustaqbulat lieidatihina -aiy fi tahr lm yaqae fih jamaeun, 'aw fi haml zahir- wahfazuu aledt; litaelamuu waqt alrijeat 'iin 'aradtum 'an turajaeuhuna, wakhafuu allah rabakum, la takhrujuu almutalaqat min albuyut alty ysknn fiha 'iilaa 'ana tanqadi eidatuhuna, wahi thlath hayidat lighayr alsaghirat walayisat walhamila, wala yajuz lahuna alkhuruj minha bi'anfusihin, 'illa 'iidha faealn faelatan munkiratan zahiratan kalzanaa, watilk 'ahkam allah alati sharieaha lieibadihi, wamin yatajawaz 'ahkam allah faqad zalam nafsuh, wa'awradaha murid alhalak. la tdry- 'ayuha almtlliq-: laeal allah yuhdith baed dhlk altalaq amrana la tatawaqaeuh fatarajaeuha
